DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate metabolism pharmacokinetics BIBR 1048 MS BIBR 953 ZW man .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolism Pharmacokinetics 14C-BIBR 953 ZW After Administration Single Doses 14C-BIBR 953 ZW Intravenously 14C-BIBR 1048 Oral Solution Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject determine result screen Signed write informed consent subject accordance regulatory legal requirement UK Age 30 55 year age Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.5 29.9 kg/m² Any finding medical examination ( include BP , pulse rate ECG ) deviate normal clinical relevance History current gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunologic , hormonal disorder History relevant orthostatic hypotension , faint spell blackout , volunteer diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder Diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder Chronic relevant acute infection History allergy/hypersensitivity ( include drug allergy ) deem relevant trial judge principal investigator History bleed disorder include prolonged habitual bleeding History hematologic disease History cerebral bleeding ( e.g . car accident ) History craniocerebral trauma Intake drug long half life ( ≥ 24h ) within 1 month prior administration Any drug may influence result trial within 10 day prior administration trial Any volunteer participate another trial investigational drug within 3 month ( 4 month drug new chemical entity ) prior administration trial Exposition radiation previous 12 month ( i.e . serial xrays , CT scan barium meal ) Smoker Alcohol abuse ( > 60 g/day ) Drug abuse Blood donation within 12 week prior administration trial Any excessive physical activity within 5 day prior administration trial Any laboratory value outside clinically accept reference range History familial bleeding disorder Platelets > 150 x 109 /l Unable defecate least day every two day
